org.mxupdate.eclipse.mxadapter.connectors
Interface IConnector

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractConnector, SSHConnector, URLConnector
public interface IConnector

Interface to define a connector between the Eclipse Plug-In and the MX server.

Version:
$Id: IConnector.java 760 2010-03-14 23:41:22Z tim.moxter $
Author:
The MxUpdate Team

Method Summary
 void disconnect()
          Disconnects from the MX server.
 String execute(String _arg1, String _arg2, String _arg3)
          Executes a 'dispatch' of the MxUdpate Update tools on the MX server.
 boolean isUpdateByFileContent()
          Checks if the content of the configuration item file must be also transferred or if it is enough that only a link is submitted.
 

Method Detail

execute

String execute(String _arg1,
               String _arg2,
               String _arg3)
               throws Exception
Executes a 'dispatch' of the MxUdpate Update tools on the MX server.

Parameters:
_arg1 - first argument
_arg2 - second argument
_arg3 - third argument
Returns:
returned value from the execution
Throws:
Exception - if execute failed

disconnect

void disconnect()
                throws Exception
Disconnects from the MX server.

Throws:
Exception - if disconnect failed

isUpdateByFileContent

boolean isUpdateByFileContent()
Checks if the content of the configuration item file must be also transferred or if it is enough that only a link is submitted.

Returns:
true if the file content to update must be also transfered; otherwise false
